info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 7:26PM EDT until July 06 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BEAVER COUNTY... At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Baden, or near Aliquippa, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Aliquippa, Economy, Ambridge, Baden, and Harmony Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
